title: Ranked and normal borders (Season 5/Patch 5.22) vs PROJECT loading screen cards
body:
Hey,

I don't know if anyone else noticed this, but new borders are actually smaller than borders before Patch 5.22 and smaller than PROJECT loading screen cards. Maybe it is not important for some of you but for me it is important, at some point. I paid extra rp for that card. Can someone from riot or the development team do something about it ? Like edit the splash art to make cards a bit smaller ?

replies.body:
Hey Sweet Canadian,

Thanks so much for bringing this to our attention! This appears to be even more of an issue as the ranks increase. We're currently discussing potential solutions for this issue! ^-^
